name: La Vie en Rose [Demo]
description:
Hello from Team Abyss and friends! We're the devs that made the demos of Abyss (April 2019) and Hellevator (April 2020). For the Yaoi Game Jam 2020 and Summer Novel Festival 2020, we bring to you a heartfelt story of love and .

The game is currently still a demo version. We hope to complete the game as soon as possible after the jam with more sound design, full game routes, and an additional GUI component.

Thank you for playing, and we hope you enjoy the game!

Features

Around 4 hours of content to experience (demo is shortened to 2 hours).
Dynamic GUI.
Multiple endings (in the full version of the game).
A colourful and quirky cast of characters to fall in love with...!
16 music tracks to lull you and immerse you in the story.
9 CGs to make moments more impactful!

Warning

The game deals with triggering themes and non-explicit depictions of sexual behaviour, including partial nudity.
For more details on these topics, check the bottom of the page - there will be spoilers!
